name: Tacx Flux S Smart Trainer
description: A smart, direct-drive trainer that's quiet, easy to use and fully interactive with training apps. It also takes tire slippage and pressure calibration out of the equation. ANT+ and Bluetooth smart compatible, so it works with tablets, phones, computers and GPS headunits. With the ability to be controlled by a 3rd party training tool, you can set your intervals before getting on your bike and let the trainer do the resistance adjustments while you focus on goals.Direct drive trainer ensures that every watt you generate is accounted for.Shimano/SRAM compatible freehub body make for easy cassette fitting.Updated frame allows for use with long cage derailleurs.Trainer can be controlled by Tacx's app, Zwift, TrainerRoad, Kinomap and many other apps.FE-C and Bluetooth smart control allows you to focus on your training and let the app of you choice change the resistance.ERG mode allows you to maintain a certain effort level regardless of your cadence.Realistic slope simulation of up to 10%.Maximum brake power of 1500W ensure you reach your limit before the trainer does.A 7kg flywheel, with a flywheel effect of 22.8kg, ensures your get a road like feeling when riding on your trainer.Power reading accuracy of less than 3% requires calibration for best results.Compatible with 12mm 130mm and 135mm quick release axles.135x10mm, 142x9mm and 148x9mm axles are available separately.Cassette sold separately.
